name: intronote
label: Welcome to Lindsey's form. Swipe to move forward.

label: Thank you, ${name}, for agreeing to participate.

name: constraintdemo
label: Try to enter an integer lesser than 1 or greater than 99.
constraint message: You must enter a number greater than 0 and lesser than 100.
